short_description: cornerstay is a hotel based in coimbatore south, india.
long_description: fully furnished stay at budget prices. situated in the heart of coimbatore. cornerstay is located in two prime locations of coimbatore-racecourse and peelamedu. racecourse comprises of 3 fully furnished rooms and peelamedu comprises of 12 rooms. be it corporate travel, medical tourism, wedding visits or a fun tour to unwind, our competitive tariffs and superior service makes corner stay a perfect option for your stay. we are continuously in search of new talents for the role of frontdesk officials, housekeeping staffs, operations manager. rates are upto 60% lesser compared to hotel rooms with similar amenities.

generated_description: cornerstay is a serviced apartment provider located in coimbatore, india. the company offers fully furnished and luxury apartments for both short and long-term stays in coims, with rates up to 60% less than hotel rooms with similar amenities. the apartments are located in two prime locations, racecourse and peelamedu, with cornerstay having three fully furnished rooms and 12 rooms respectively. the properties are suitable for corporate travel, medical tourism, wedding visits, or a fun tour to unwind. the caretaker is present round the clock to tend to guests' needs, and healthy home-cooked food is available at a nominal charge. the health and safety of every guest is the company's top priority during the pandemic.
